Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientReader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class is run on a thread on the client and is executed in parallel with the user interface. It manages all the messages received from the server, updates the ClientView and notifies the interface (CLI or GUI) about the changes

    GUI constructor

    • ClientReader

      public ClientReader​(java.io.BufferedReader in, CLIWriter cli, ClientView clientView, java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch latch)
      CLI constructor
      Parameters:
      in - the inputStream to read
      clientView - the view to update
      latch - countdown latch before connection closes

      Parameters:
      in - the inputStream to read
      clientView - the view to update
      gui - the GUI class to notify when the server sends updates and ping it back

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      The method used to run this class in multithreading. Initiates a loop which reads the messages sent by the server and updates the ClientView accordingly
      Specified by:
